name: Synthwave Invaders
description:
Project made in 3 days by a team of 5 students.

Our goal was to remake a Space Invaders game and add as many feedbacks we could to make the game as much juicy and appealing as possible !

HOW TO USE

Launching the game will display a classic Space Invaders game !
Use your keypads from 1 to 9  to display all the feedbacks we created for the game ! 

CREDITS

Programming

Nathan Bonkena - Elliot Blazy - Maxime Blandin

Game Design
